resources.string: Content (Here you write the main text of your work. The content field expands as the text is filled in.):
Go to the list of chapters
Go to the list of heroes
Go to the list of locations
Go back to the list of books
To create a new chapter, click on the \"Add\" button in the lower right corner
To create a new book, click on the \"Add\" button in the lower right corner.
Go to the list of books
Are you sure you want to delete the book?
Are you sure you want to save the book?
Are you sure you want to save the chapter?
Are you sure you want to delete the chapter?
The beginning of the story. Briefly describe how your story begins (description of the world, action scene, etc.):
The appearance of the characters. Briefly outline the theme of the story, describe the relationships of the characters:
The reasons (prerequisites) for the development of the plot in this direction:
The development of the main plot along with the secondary ones, the development of relationships between the characters:
The conflict is becoming more serious, now everyone knows about it:
The characters strive to resolve the conflict, personal growth, and awareness of the problem:
The beginning of solving the problem:
Go to the list of races
Go to the list of terms
The serial number of the chapter in the table of contents:
Remove all ads from this app
How the main character changes throughout the story:
How other characters change throughout the story:
Do you want to save the theme of the work?
To create a new hero click on the \"Add\" button in the lower right corner
Are you sure you want to delete the hero?
Are you sure you want to save the hero?
Describe the character\'s face: eye color, nose and lip shape, cheekbones, eyebrows, etc.:
Physique, height, weight (and in this regard, the impression of others about the character):
Features of clothing, accessories (and in this regard, the impression of others about the character):
Attractive and repulsive sides of the character, weaknesses and strengths of the character, habits, hobbies, complexes:
The manner of speech (and in this regard, the impression of others about the character):
The character\'s behavior in the family and in society:
The trials that befell the character:
Character\'s dreams and ideals, goals and motivations:
How the character appears in the story, his role in the story, how the character leaves the story:
How the character changes throughout the story (personal growth or decline):
The character\'s family, relationships within the family, how they spend their time:
The character\'s friends, relationships, what kind of influence they have on each other, how they spend their time:
The enemies of the character, the relationship, what influence they have on each other, how they spend their time:
To create a new location click on the \"Add\" button in the lower right corner
To create a new people click on the \"Add\" button in the lower right corner
To create a new term click on the \"Add\" button in the lower right corner
Geography of the location (geographical location, relief, nature, wildlife):
How is this place notable for your history:
The role of this people in your history:
Are you sure you want to delete the location?
Are you sure you want to save the location?
Are you sure you want to delete the people?
Are you sure you want to save the people?
Are you sure you want to delete the term?
Are you sure you want to save the term?
To continue working, you need to log in to your account or confirm your desire to work without registration.
It was not possible to send an email to this email address!
To recover your password, please enter your e-mail!
An email has been sent to your email address to confirm the email address
It was not possible to send an email to your email address to confirm the mailing address
Fill in all the fields, please!
The email address is already in use by another account.
The email address is badly formatted.
The given password is invalid. [ Password should be at least 6 characters ]
You have successfully logged into your account!
The supplied auth credential is incorrect, malformed or has expired.
Failed to log in as a Guest.
You are logged out of your account!
First, select the type of literature!
You can change the color of the text or its fat content, but only for the content. Before applying a particular style, select the desired section of text.
If desired, you can change the color of the text or its fat content, but only for the "Short description" section. Before applying a particular style, select the desired section of text.
You can move the color palette by holding its upper edge, or hide it by clicking the button again.
If you have changed the theme color in the settings, then restart the application to see the changes.
Press back again to leave the app.
Theme customization is only possible from the \"Book List\" page.

If you apply a style to a text fragment to which this type of style has already been applied (fatness/color), then the previous style changes will be canceled for the entire text fragment to which the style was previously applied.
You can add emojis to your text.
Permissions to save the file have not been received. The file has not been saved.
Extract text from a PDF file
Extract text from a TXT file
Extract text from a DOCX file
You are trying to open a file of a different format.
Please note that if the text extracted from the file is longer than the allowed length, it will be truncated.
When extracting text from a file (PDF, TXT), the text is added to the content.
Please note that when saving to a file, all styles that you have applied to the text will be canceled.

Pay attention. If you work without registration, then your books will be saved only locally, without the possibility of saving to a cloud database. In this mode, only those books that you have created without registration will be displayed.
Mistake. It is not possible to extract text from this file using our application.
Save the changes you made in the plot, otherwise they will be lost.
Save your changes to the theme, otherwise they will be lost.
Please wait. Extracting text from large PDF files can take up to 2.5 minutes.
I am interested in your book!
The application for sending emails has not been found!
Filtering books by genre of literature:
Are you sure you want to delete the book from the published ones?
You cannot make changes to a published book because it is not available on your device.

To publish a book, all fields must be filled in! 1. Go back to the application section where you created your book and fill in all the fields: book title, type of literature, genre of literature, short description. (Later, if you want to change these fields in a published book, also first make changes in the section where you are creating a book, then select this book from the published ones, click the "Edit" button, and in the window that opens, click the "Publish" button.) 2. Open at least one chapter for publication. 3. Do not forget to specify the email address.
If the book selection section is empty, it means that you do not have unpublished books, i.e. all books created on this device have been published, or you have not created any books yet.
Only guests and registered users can only create books. Only registered users can publish books.

This book was created and published from another device. If you now remove it from the published ones from this device, then you will not be able to publish it again from the device from which you originally published it.
You can choose several names for yourself so that later, if necessary, you can sign different books with different names. Keep track of the uniqueness of the name yourself.
Only registered users can create a profile.
You haven not created more than one signature for the author yet. Create a signature?
When downloading a book from a cloud database, if this book is already on this device, it will be completely overwritten. Be extremely careful not to lose data. Continue?

The book was downloaded from a cloud database and saved on this device. If the book is saved on different devices, keep track of the relevance of the data on these devices yourself. By saving the book on different devices, you get the opportunity to make changes to the book stored in the cloud database from these devices. Be extremely careful not to lose data.
Get permission to change the screen brightness
